newsitem.title: GREECE: Greek money rates unmoved, ecu firms vs drachma.
newsitem.headline: Greek money rates unmoved, ecu firms vs drachma.

text.p: Greek depos, forex forwards and bonds were paralysed in late quiet trade and ecu/drachma had a firm tone trading around 307.35/45, dealers said.
"It has been very, very quiet today," a dealer at a foreign bank said. "Depos and forex forwards are holding in the absence of no incentives."

Ecu/drachma was trading close to the upper range of its intra-day range of 307.00-45 and dealers said some mark buying for drachmas by local players pushed mark/drachma and ecu/drachma higher in late trade, a forex dealer said.
The mark was quoted at 157.15/25 from Monday's 157.120 fix, the dollar at 270.61/71 drachmas from 270.700 and the ecu at 307.18/28 from 307.100 drachmas.
The National Bank of Greece, the domestic money market's biggest player, quoted the following late rates:
